name: Chaos Patrol
description:
Controls: "A": Up, "X": Down, "Space": Shoot, "8": Trap of Infinity, "P": Power Charge
Do not let the abominations get to the rift, or kill you.
When you kill enough enemies, your special attack will be charged. press "P" to wipe out enemies.
Press "Esc" to exit fullscreen.
Soundtrack:
ˈɔːrɡoʊn The Esoteric Energy by Filmy Ghost (Sábila Orbe)
